Yi-Chi (Angela) Wu

Graduate @ Rice University

Email: annwu@rice.edu

About Me


Hi, my name is Angela, and I’m currently pursuing a Master of Computer Science degree at Rice University. My interest lies in the intersection of Artificial Intelligence, Robotics, and Computer Vision. As a film enthusiast, I am also interested in Computer Graphics. If you would like to know more about my background, please check out my résumé or contact me via email.

Selected Projects

Sokoban on Ice

Contributors: Yi-Chi Wu, Ryan Hall

We had a blast working on this project. It took us quite an amount of time to come up with a smart encoding for the start state, the goal state, the operator encodings, the frame axioms, and the operator exclusion. Additionally, high level of precision was required to build a robust software, and it was hard to debug. Thankfully, we arrived at a great outcome, and it was highly satisfiable.

Pac-Man

Contributors: Yi-Chi Wu, Charlie Shih, Chu-Yu Huang, Daniel Quintans, Shyam Sagar, Yuxing Shi

As the technical lead of this project, my main job is to design the APIs of the game. It was quite a fun ride coming up with the APIs and the structure of the game from scratch; and since I have to think about the project in the big picture in order to distribute the coding sections gracefully to the developers and jump in whenever technical problems arise, I got very familiar with the project. I had a great time working on this project and I’m very fond of the outcomes.

Chatapp

Contributors: Yi-Chi Wu, Charlie Shih, Chu-Yu Huang, Daniel Quintans, Nishant Satpathy, Shyam Sagar, Yuxing Shi

As a developer of this project, I was mostly in charge of the GUI design of the frontend. Since I had no prior frontend experience before this, I spent some time teaching myself react.js. This project made me realized that frontend is also my cup of tea; I very much enjoyed the somewhat real-time change that we can visualize with the frontend.

Music Generation for Films

Contributors: Yi-Chi Wu, Hsi-Ai Tsao

My dear friend and I came up with this project for our final presentation of the course - Applications of AI Neural Network Models. Hopefully, it showcased our capability of dealing with both visual and audio data and both the problems of classification and generation. We learned a lot and had a blast while making this.

Experience

Rice University

Lab Member

Jan. 2022 -

https://unhelkar.github.io/research/

Advised by Vaibhav Unhelkar, Assistant Professor.

On the spring semester, I will start to work with Professor Unhelkar on a Robotics + Machine Learning project.

AndroVideo Inc.

Artificial Intelligence R&D Intern

Sep. 2020 - Feb. 2021

http://www.androvideo.com/

An A.I. camera company with an integration of software and hardware that strives to develop simple yet effective products.

I worked on a team project where I made a pull-up counter with a pose estimation model on TensorFlow. I also made a computer software for facial expression recognition that can run in real-time with close-to-zero lagging.

National Tsing Hua University

Summer Intern

Jul. 2020 - Sep. 2020

http://dcs-en.site.nthu.edu.tw/index.php

Advised by Nen-Fu ”Fred” Huang, Distinguished Professor and Dean, College of EECS.

Although I’ve learned concepts of machine learning before, the internship marked the start of my journey in the area officially. I got to contribute and participate a lot in the creation of the soybean detection model, and learned different facets to consider in an industry-academia collaboration.

Education

Rice University

Master of Computer Science

2021 -

Opened in 1912, Rice is a private research university in Houston, Texas. Constantly ranked as one of the top-ranked schools in the United States, it is known primarily for programs in science and engineering.

I am taking Statistical Machine Learning, Computer Graphics and Computer Science Project this semester.

National Taiwan University

BSc Atmospheric Sciences

2017 - 2021

Founded in 1928, NTU is the most prestigious comprehensive university in Taiwan and one of the top-ranked universities in Asia with the motto: "integrity, diligence, fidelity, and compassion."

I got to explore almost everything I’m interested in at NTU. I started coding as an Atmospheric Scientist to analyze data, and later fell in love with Computer Science because of its logicality. The freedom we had in taking courses made it possible for me to explore all sorts of areas in Computer Science: Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Computer Network, just to name a few. I am also very grateful to have met a lot of passionate and enthusiastic professors here.

University of California, Berkeley

Summer Session

2019

Established in 1868, it is the state's first land-grant university and the first campus of the University of California system. Berkeley is ranked among the world's top universities by major educational publications.

My time at Berkeley laid a solid groundwork for my knowledge in Computer Science; it completely changed how I understand and construct codes. It was fun writing organized and maintainable code while hanging out with people from all around the world that summer!

  • movies/tv series: literally can’t live without these. Feel free to check out my ratings of films here!
